remarks: Subspaces satisfy the exchange axiom.  Lemma 7.5 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 31. ( ~ cvexchi analog.)  TODO: combine some lemmas.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lcvexch.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lcvexch.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lcvexch.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` W ) $.
lcvexch.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lcvexch.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
lcvexch.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lcvexch $p |- ( ph -> ( ( T i^i U ) C U <-> T C ( T .(+) U ) ) ) $.
